评论详情: Great pants, but they definitely run big!  I wear an 8 but exchanged for 6 and still too big!

The little bit of spandex makes them very comfortable, heavy duty material, lots of pockets. I  like them so much I bought two pair. They do run a tad big but that's fine I like a little room, especially when doing farm work. I'm 5'4" and 145 lbs and the size 8 fit perfectly.
I first purchased a size 12 but they were way too big. It looked and felt like a size 14. So I got size 10 and they fit perfectly.

I bought a size 16 regular, im 220 5'8". I love these pants!! As an athletic curvy woman, it is hard to find the right fit for my thighs and glutes. I also do a lot of heavy work like landscaping,  digging, and wood work, these pants easily handle it all. I also love the extra belt loops.

It frustrates me as a woman with wider hips when I see “made for women” yet there’s no difference from men’s tactical pants. There’s no shape to these and there’s little to no stretch. I have a smaller waist, wide hips, thick thighs and a booty and I experienced the same as always - gaping at the back, pockets opening to expose the white inside, worrying I always have plumbers crack when I bend over. I know that’s just my body but you might as well buy men’s pants because it’s the same fit. These are doable for the price but don’t expect greatness.

I’m 5’2 and 152 lbs and size 10 is just loose enough for big dinner waist or winter legging. Since I use this pants during forest clearing, I don’t want them to be skin tight and just give extra buffer room for spike bush. It of course longer than my legs but it’s to be expected.

I'm a construction worker and have 3 pairs of these Dickies and really like them. HOWEVER the sizing is awful. The 4 is advertised as a 27.5" waist, I'm 29-30" and they are far too big. The problem is that I don't want to size down bc then the legs would fit snug enough that I couldn't fit all my things in the pockets. I'm 5'1" so I expect most pants to be too long, but these are even longer than normal. It's ok if I wear boots that keep them off the ground, but any kind of lower shoe has them dragging all the way at my toes. Either have to fold them up massively or hem them.

Not sure if this happens with men's work wear,  but the sizing in women's carpenter pants is consistently unreliable for Dickies and Carharts.  These pants were one of my favorites - comfortable, durable, with ok pockets and hammer loop. I am 5'7 138 lbs and usually wear size 6 or 8.  With these Dickies I sized down to a 4 but the ones that just arrived are huge!! Maybe I should have ordered a size 2??  I decided to keep them and will try and shrink them down with hot washing and high drying. I'm afraid the size 2 would fit weird in some other tighter way.  I have had GREAT luck with Dovetail Workwear made by and for women. 90% consistent fit  and their pants are in another league of quality, fit, and thoughtfulness about what we need to look good and get through the work day.
Love the quality of these but feel they are a little bigger than an actual size 2, otherwise they are comfortable.

评论概述: Order at least two sizes down
评论详情: I usually wear a 4 or 6. I’ve put on some weight I thought I’d need an 8 I ordered a 6 since I read they were large fitting. They were are so big. I wish I had ordered a 4

The pants are decent thickness.  They run huge.  I went down a size from what was recommended.  Next time I'm going down two sizes.  I will wind up needing to wear a belt with these.  They are comfortable.  However,  they do fit like men's pants.  The pockets aren't as big as men's pants.  They are immediately comfortable.  It would be nice if they offered these pants in a petite length.  The pants I got were 32 length.  I prefer 29 or 30 length.  Overall they seem to be a good pair of pants.

评论概述: Tough for work but still cute
评论详情: I love these pants and went back and got 2 more pairs.  I work outdoors with messy toddlers - exploring mud, dirt and all manner of detritus - and I was ruining all my jeans and pants, especially by crawling around on my knees.  These double fronted work pants stand up to the abuse, look cute and are very comfortable.  I only wish they came in a smaller size -- I bought the smallest size available (Size 2? - Actually, I just reread my published review and see I am reviewing the Size 4 pair that was my first purchase.  I returned the Size 4 for a Size 2, which I thought I was reviewing here.  The Size 2 was still to large, as stated) and they are still too loose and a bit too long (even wearing my thick soled Hokas).  I am 5'3" and 114lbs - just for comparison if that helps in sizing.  It would also be nice if they came in navy blue, in addition to the colors they have.

评论概述: Very durable. Fit seems a little large. But basically solid work jeans.
评论详情: Quality

These pants are exactly what I was looking for however they do run quite large. I am 5"4, 125 and normally a size 6. I took the advice of others and ordered down a size to a 4. There is still plenty of movement room which is what I was hoping for as these are work pants for me.
I really wanted to like these jeans I need them for work but this isn’t it I’m 125lb and 5’9” I don’t have much of a butt but these are not a true 2 more like a 4 I will be returning

I am 5’10” 128-135 lbs. Normally I am a “Size 6” in trousers. My weight fluctuates a lot and so do the sizes manufacturers create. Nothing is ever the same! Lol. I personally struggle with finding pants long enough, but if you are tall you will NOT have a problem with these pants no matter what waist size you get. If you are shorter, cuffing and hemming as previous reviews state will be your reality.  I tried 2/26, 4/27 and 6/28. All were perfect in length. I kept the Size 2 and the 6. The Size 2 is what is in the photos.  Size 2: fit perfectly around my hips/waist with no back gap. Perfect amount of hug in my thighs while not being too tight and again, length is just fine. They truly are more like 32-34” in length. All of them. Size 4: started to get that loose waist gap at my back and same with the Size 6. Size 6: I wear them as a more “masculine” fit as they sit lower and right on my hips. Stretch a little bit through the day and become slightly saggier but, whatever. Sometimes I like bigger pants.  Thick + durable material, definitely will cause some swamp ass in hotter weather but will be great for winter. Zipper is a medium rating… Pocket quantity: bangin’. 1-10 stretch is at about a 7.5 4 stars only because I had to order 3 sizes and because I haven’t given them a true go yet at work.

I don’t understand why workwear for petite women is impossible to find. I typically wear a size 6 in jeans, so I ordered a size four and they fell down to my ankles. So I exchanged for a size 2, and you can tell by the photo they’re still huge. Why doesn’t Dickies have a size 0, or more realistic pant sizes that are on par with normal women?! It’s like as soon as something is labeled “heavy duty” they increase the size automatically. I just want work pants that will fit me and that seems impossible.

I have ordered these multiple times now forgetting that they never fit. The price point and quality are great, but the sizing is way jacked up. I'm a 0/2 in all other pants. 5'2, 125 pounds, decently slim but I work construction for a living so muscular build. The waist gap is insane. The amount that I have to fold the band so a belt will hold them up is uncomfortable. Length is way way too long. I love the quality but I wish there was one size smaller available. I've tried Dovetail, Carhartt, Red Ants, 511, and these do last the longest. They're just so uncomfortable and make me look like I borrowed my older brothers clothes for work.

I love Dickies, and this is not their problem but mine. I apparently need a size 0-2 as a size 4 with a 27 inch waist is too big. I should have realized that they would be too big, bit thought they would fit.
I love the knees!! The pockets are my favorites

I have been waiting for a FIFTY DOLLAR REFUND for a month now. And the pants were absolute garbage, the crotch was roughly ten inches long and the pants were MASSIVE and I ordered a size four and a size two and neither of them were small enough. CAN NOT STRESS ENOUGH THAT THIS SELLER IS ROTTEN.
The fabric is durable, but they don't feel very stretchy. I may need to break them in some. And we shall see how breathable they are.

评论概述: True to size, don’t size down if you have a shape.
评论详情: I wear a 15 and purchased a 14 because the comments said they run big. They do not run big. Especially if you have hips and a butt. They came all the way up but were snug on my thighs and didn’t cover my entire butt in the back. Returning these. I’ve already purchased a 16, hopefully they fit better.

I like the pants very much, but received the wrong size.  ordered a 6/28 (I’m short) and received a pair with an inseam of 32 and what feels like a size 8.  Keeping them (rolling cuff and wearing belt), because I like them.

评论概述: It’s too long, but exactly what I wanted
评论详情: The whole pants, everything is perfect but as a 5’2 person it was too long for me and I wished I got it shorter

The quality is good and sturdy. Size 12.....the leg length was two inches past my heels. I wish I would have known the length! Also, the pockets gap a bit showing the white cotton lining. There was no way to keep these pants.

I’m a size 0 and the smallest size they had was a as 2 but with a belt they fit great! I HIGHLY recommend for any woman working in trades. The double thickness helps so much with protecting your legs. They have a lot of movement to them as well and aren’t restricting. It accentuates any curves while making it appropriate for heavy duty work.
Good material, stronger than expected and the size is a perfect fit.
I guess by "size six" they mean that six of me will fit. Comfortably.

These pants are objectively terrible. Maybe no one at Dickies has seen a woman up close before because the proportions are way off. I bought my usual size and when they came I noticed the inseam was listed at 31”. When I put them on the waist fit fine but the are super long and baggy from the knee down. I measured the seam and it was 31.5”. And now to the worst part the pockets. They are still doing the undersized girl pocket thing. Not a single pocket on these pants can hold a cellphone or wallet. No idea how I’m supposed to work with nowhere to put the phone and take calls. Also the incorrect pocket measurements are what make them tuft out so you can always see the white lining. Someone else mentioned that and unfortunately it’s true you never look put together. I also don’t see how you could get your knee pads in the slots. Mine sure don’t fit. I get the impression these are supposed to be for the work fashion aesthetic and not actual work pants. The only reason I’m keeping these is I don’t have the money for another brand right now.

I typically wear a size 4-6 in women’s pants and I ordered a size 2 and they fit me perfectly. My one qualm with this product is that they are low rise so I’m constantly pulling them up, but other than that I am really happy with these pants!
Good quality. Size down, large waist. I wear an 8, I returned it and got a 6.

These run big, I wear a 4 in regular jeans but had to exchange for a 2. I have a pretty straight body shape without much of a curve so maybe they're just designed for a more feminine shape. The reviews about the white pockets showing are totally correct even if you dont have curves. They must have photo shopped it out on the model. In any case I really like the pants, comfortable and sturdy.

I needed durable pants to work on my car. I was skeptical of the sizing but I a size 8 in the tan. I’m 5’3 160lbs and it fits great. Slightly long but it’ll be fine with boots. Good quality and stretches where you need it to!
Runs large
Sizing and quality is good. No complaints

I purchased size 12, washed them and they don’t shrink.  They were a bit too big, I’ve lost weight so purchased a size 10 as  my other size 10 Dickies fit but the cut is slimmer, I believe a size 8 will work better.  The pants are regular length so size 10 Reg is not 30 inch inseam, it’s closer to 32 inches.  I would recommend these pants but state they run a little big.

评论概述: Not what I call stretch, but they fit
评论详情: I love Dickies, but these are not stretch, but they still fit nice.
Just what I needed for working in a very dirty warehouse .  Fit is spot on and material is thick for very cold winter months
I could fit in one leg of these.

I usually wear a size 4. After reading other reviews saying that these pants run large, I ordered a 2. They were so big they fell off of me. Of course I tried using a belt, but they bunched a lot around my waist. It was very uncomfortable and looked really bad around the crotch. It's too bad. I was so excited for these. They have so many pockets!  If you order these pants, order at least 2 sizes smaller than you usually do.

I go through work pants VERY quickly and have a had expirience with a ton of different brands (it’s hard to come by good women’s work pants) On first wear these pants aren’t bad, they’re nice and double stitched on the thigh which I always like. My only issues so far seem to be that the pocket lining always shows (you can always see the white interior of the pockets even if they’re tucked in and flat) and they’re a bit long even at 29in inseam. Once I put my boots on I’m sure they won’t be as cumbersome but in my socks they’re under my feet by a few inches. The color is nice though, and the longevity reputation of dickies is pretty good. I’m hoping they last

评论概述: Good quality, loose in the waist
评论详情: Good quality pants. Lots of stretch but definitely fit loose through the waist.
I consider myself a fairly average sized woman but maybe Dickies would disagree. I can’t find a size or cut that won’t gap in the back.
Only wore these pants for 2 weeks and they ripped super easily. Disappointed in the material.

Perfect fit (I got an 8 and wear 6-8), and very comfortable. They did shrink about half a size when washed and dried on hot, but that was expected because of the high quality natural fibers in the material. Love these!
These pants fit worse than men’s Carhartt. Waist feels too big, thighs are too small, and calf is too big. Buy women’s Carhartts instead.

评论概述: good stretch and a little too long
评论详情: I love these pants, they have a lot more stretch than other work pants that I own. They are cute, and fit well, except for the length! Dickies needs to offer a short size for shorter people, because these are extremely long. I also love that they are a little more high wasted. I would say size down! I normally am a 12, and got a 10 and they are still loose, probably could have went to an 8! Overall, love the pants just wish I didn’t have to roll or hem them.

评论概述: Pockets are white and dont stay covered
评论详情: Very disappointed to find that the pockets are made with a white material that NEVER sits completely covered by the main fabric. This is exactly what I was hoping to avoid by buying pants from Dickies instead of womens fast fashion brands. Like this never happens with Carhartts? Looks cheap and ill-fitting even though they feel great and solid. I'll see if I can find a similar color patch to sew in.
Exactly what I wanted.

I usually buy wrangler men’s and they always fall about so quick. These are great material, tons of pockets but I would say size down. I’m normally a size 4, 5’4 140 lbs and I got a size 2 and they’re perfect!

These are heavy duty work pants!  The quality is excellent, the fabric is very comfortable and they have nice deep pockets.  In cold weather, these keep you warm and the wind out.  In summer, I didn't feel overheated wearing them, but I probably didn't work in them on extremely hot days.My first pair were size 4.  After wearing them all day, the waist gets a bit loose till I wash them again.  They do run large, but still are fine.  Size 2 is perfect!  Fits me like they should. I like that Dickies gives a lot of length in the legs.  Being short, the length is too long for me, so, I fold the bottoms up inside the leg and that works fine and looks good.When gardening, my Moss Green Dickies don't show dirt and grass stains like my blue jeans.  They wash very nicely too.  My older ones faded some after time and washings, but I really like the color they became.
Seemed extra long.

These are really good for construction type work when you need pockets and pants that won’t rip or tear and also that stay up on your waist and comfortable. They are really large in the legs and wide but perfect for over work boots. I like that they are loose, if you like your work pants more fitted order a size down or maybe try for a slim or straight leg

These look sturdy and well made. The problem is that even though I usually wear a size 4, these size 4's are like a size 6 or bigger. I'm swimming in them. I thought they sent men's pants by mistake but they aren't. They don't come smaller either. Too bad because I'd love them if they fit:(
The product was too big. Had to return still waiting for my refund 😕 really wish they sold small women’s sizes in the store near me. Would love to try them on before I buy them.

评论概述: great pants! different fit from other dickies though
评论详情: i love these pants, they’re a nice, durable, work pant and i love the olive color. my only complaint is that the fit is notably different from my other dickies. i’ve gotten a pair of dickies relaxed fit cargo pants, same size, and these were significantly bigger despite being a regular fit. the materials are different, these are a stiffer fabric, but still noticeably longer and larger in the waist and hip/butt area. still lovely pants! just wanted to point it out to help anyone else avoid the same mistake!!

I decided to return these because I sized up and they were way too big.  I'd recommend to buy true to your size, I'm pretty wide in the hips and thighs and they were still baggy throughout.  No stretch to speak of, but nice, thick material.
They’re very long and for sure run big. I could’ve gotten two sizes smaller and been fine. The quality of the material is great though!
I work construction and these pants aren't only durable but they are comfortable and stylish at the same time.

评论概述: True to size, good stretch, weird shape. Like 'em tho.
评论详情: I gained a little weight and needed a more comfortable pair of work pants next size up. I tried these and a pair of Carharrts to compare. The Carharrts ran small and I couldn't bring myself to go up yet another size (I know it's just arbitrary but mentally I just couldn't deal). And they had very little stretch to them compared to these Dickies.  These slid on, but like others have said they are a weird shape, a bit boxy - like a pair of men's pants that fit fine on the thighs and hips but the waist is a bit big since they aren't shaped for a body with curves.  Still, I can handle the tiny bit of waist gap with a belt for the comfort of these, and they seem durable enough for my needs as a gardener and DIYer.

I bought these for doing yard work including clearing blackberry bushes. I never imagined I'd actually fall in love! They have a slight stretch but are still thick and sturdy and the waist is definitely perfect for thicker thighs with a smaller waist.

These just looked cool to me as I wanted something different than blue jeans. I ordered size 12 but I honestly could have gotten a couple sizes smaller. I am trying to shrink them with hot washes and dries. I should have ordered 3 inch less waist size but I think after a half dozen hot wash and dries they will fit much better. I still got to wear a belt but I didn't know what size would fit me. 5 stars for the quality,price and amazon being fast with shipping.

I'm so glad I found these on Amazon. They fit well; I've even gotten compliments on them from work friends. Plenty of deep pockets and loops for tools. I love the reinforced thigh material. They wash and dry beautifully.

They are pretty exspensive for what you get. There are many other options that are virtually the same for cheaper. But I still think they deserve a ok review. But there are cheaper options for the samething and these days it speaks alot.

love these pants for work, im in construction so they work perfect for me. definitely will be buying again, theyre comfy, squat proof, pockets are deep and i love the side pockets. not too tight around my thighs, slightly loose around the waist, my butt and thighs are thick and its not too tight or loose. decently high waisted, they come up to just below my belly button (5ft7 and around 220 lbs for reference) the pants are warm too, i wore them with leggings under in 19-26 degree weather today and they kept me warmer than my jeans/leggings combo. not too long not too short, and its a good material, im excited to see how long they last me for work

评论概述: Go with what you know when it comes to size.
评论详情: Amazon said a 4 would fit me best based on previous orders, I could take them off without unbuttoning them. Just too big is all but otherwise they are what I was looking for so I ordered a smaller size so we’ll see!!
I'm 5'9 and 140 pounds got the size 6

I ordered these in a size 12, I could have gotten a size 10 with how they fit, but the 12’s will allow me to have more room to get in awkward welding positions. The pant legs are true straight legs so they feel like a flare or bell bottom, however even my biggest boots fit great under them. I do need to wear a belt as there is some gap in the back when I lean forward but I usually always wear a belt anyways. I do have a booty but my stomach is pretty flat so that could be why.
Product was awful, fit was awful

评论概述: A little large, but about what I expected
评论详情: I saw someone wearing a pair of Dickies and asked where she got them.  Then I came to Amazon to shop for them.  Based on the size chart, I ordered a size 8.  (I’m 5’3”, 138lbs, short waisted with slightly long legs.). Tried these on as soon as they came, and the waist is a little loose, as are the hips, but I wanted them loose in the hips.  I’m washing and drying them in the dryer to soften them and see if they draw up a little.  If needed, I’ll have the waist taken in, because I don’t want to lose the slightly loose fit of the hips.  I think they’ll be great for hiking and casual wear (60 yes old, retired, and I don’t “dress to impress” much anymore - ha!).  Happy with these!
I usually wear a 28" waist (like the extra room for doing work projects) so ordered a size 6. But these were huge- more like a 32 or larger. Thus I can't rate their features,

I like the pants they are big for an extra small. I like the material and the way they’re made I just wish they fit me I had to give them to someone else that they fit. But if they would come up with an extra extra small to fit me, I would definitely buy again.
Previous reviews stated this item runs small so I ordered one size larger and they were way too big.

评论概述: Too long on me, but comfy.
评论详情: Comfortable, durable fabric, still a little stiff- I hope they soften more as I wear them. They're too long, so I'll have to hem up a few inches. I love the color and trust dickies clothes- they're awesome value!
Got these for work love the doubles padded look but plenty of stretch unlike men’s jeans. Will buy more.
Definitely order a size down. I love them and will be buying more.
These were way too big and almost like bell bottoms if anyone remembers those! Ugh! Returning and not getting a smaller size. Not flattering or what I was expecting at all!

These are my go-to work pants.  They fit true to size, but shrink if dried or washed in hot water (which I did when working in areas with ticks).  I initially ordered another model of Dickies pants in size 6 and they ran small, then I ordered these and was happy with the sizing and fit.  They stretch out a little throughout the day.One of the most annoying things about these pants is they scrimped on the inner pocket material so the white parts of the inner pocket hang out, even when you’re standing up.  I could maybe understand if they were too tight and pulling the hip material for that reason, but even when these are loose, the white part of the pocket lining is showing.  They scrimped on material and didn’t put enough outer material in the pocket.The material and design is sturdy for a lot of farm work I do.  I ordered this in two colors and these are the work pants I always reach for.I’m 5’4” and I’d estimate somewhere in the 130-140lb range with an hourglass figure and these fit well.
These pants fit very well. I normally have a problem with the waistline being too large, but it's not the case with this particular pant.

评论概述: Bottom of legs were bigger that advertised in image, but true fit through waist and hips
评论详情: Bought for outdoor work. True fit in waist and hips, however,  legs were too big at bottom.

I can't say enough good things about these work jeans. I used these every day in a shop environment and they have out-performed even the men's version - especially in the area of the side carpenter's pocket. After much use, my screw driver stored there still has not worn a hole through the material, which has been a common problem for me. Same with specialty keys and the back pockets - no holes yet after much use.  My only slight gripe is that the pockets are just a touch more shallow than the men's, but not as bad as a lot of other women's pants. The pockets also seem to get scratchy on the inside in time, but these slight flaws can be overlooked given the overall durability of these amazing work pants.
These pants are great.  I am 5ft 6 tall and weigh 145.  I ordered size 8 and they were perfect !

I really enjoy these pants. They are perfect for work, they are a tiny bit bigger than I expected but honestly they fit perfectly with a belt. I will definitely be buying a second pair I wish there was just more colors available.
My new favorite pants. I weld in these pants, and I have no problems whatsoever. I’ve worn them many times, and I just absolutely adore them. Quality material. Good durability. Very comfortable.

The fabric seemed quite durable and there was plenty of stretch in the legs, but the waistband was very rigid. It had no give at all. This caused the pants to be very uncomfortable for me. It makes no sense to have stretchy pants with a rigid waistband.

评论概述: Doesn't fit my body type right
评论详情: They are way too baggy. I'm a size 2 and only 5.0ft, the waist is really the only part of them that fits. Wish they had a low-rise option. I'm a maintenance technician and can never find a good pair of work pants that will work for my small frame. Super sad sauce 😭
Good quality, will buy more.
Good work pants. I need longer ones but these work. Durable and cute

评论概述: Like the product not the fit
评论详情: I liked the dexterity of these pants, but they were loose around my waist. I wear a size 4 and that is what I ordered, but it has about 2 inches of fabric extra on it. Overall I like these pants for work but I do need to wear a belt. I would suggest maybe sizing down if possible. It’s not horribly too large but just enough to be uncomfortable and look awkward/balled up in the front with a belt.
I am 5’ 5” 130 pounds. These fit perfectly! I got a size 2/28. The material has some give which will be great for my job.The material is medium weight. Not scratchy.

I was looking for these types of pants (cargo), I could not find any that fit well until I tried these.  The pants fit nicely with just enough stretch so they do not bag and sag.  This was a good purchase.

评论概述: Nice work-in-the-garden and on the trail pants, but runs a bit large. Lots of useful pockets.
评论详情: The pants run large, possibly could have sized down.
I went with a size 6 typically a size 4 but have a booty and reading the reviews I went with size 6. They need a belt. Other than that they are comfortable and great quality

评论概述: They fit perfect except for my waist.
评论详情: I am a journeyman electrician working in new construction. They are very durable and comfortable to wear.

Originally bought the brown pants first and love them. The stretch, the fit, I'm 5'5" and 135, USUALLY around a size 6 regular, these run big and the the size 4 fit me perfect... (in brown) I ordered the same size 4 regular pants in GREEN and they're too big. The waiste is higher, the legs are longer and makes a weird, baggy pooch in the front, fitting more like mens. Washing and drying them made it slightly better but not much.

A nice pair of pants! They do run a size big. I usually fit in a 4, but a size 2 fit fine. Definitely size down. The material is a rugged canvas type of material. They are made very well. The color was off. I ordered moss green, but as you can see from the picture it was like a grey. Still liked them though! Not a summer pant to be sure, but a good pant to wear for working outside in cooler weather.

评论概述: Not new - used and then repackaged
评论详情: I ordered a 6 first- they were in perfect condition, with tags of course, but too big.  I exchanged them for a 4- they came today in different packaging from the first pair.  These were obviously worn and/or washed, no tags, wrinkled and covered in hair.  I'm a big fan of used clothing and buy most of my clothes 2nd hand, but if I pay $50 for new pair of pants, they should be NEW.  I'm returning them.  No replacement this time.  Sad.

Product seems of decent quality but the sizing is way off. I am 5’ 5.5” and weigh about 115 lbs, these pants are extremely large in every way. I understand women have curves but it would be nice if there was appropriate sizing for smaller shaped females like myself who need decent, quality work pants.
These pants, size 2, were so large I could take them off without unzipping them. Made for tall women.
